short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Alix allows you to lint your HTML for Accessibility issues simply by applying a stylesheet that makes use of advanced CSS selectors.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Alix for Chrome is an extension for a11y.css. It allows you to lint your HTML for Accessibility issues simply by applying a stylesheet that makes use of advanced CSS selectors.
